description: OverviewThe MSc in Maritime Logistics and Business is in collaboration with Piri Reis University (PRU) in Istanbul Turkey, a specialist maritime university. Delivered by the Edinburgh Business School, this MSc offers students a unique insight into the increasingly growing and profitable maritime logistics market. Providing students with first-hand knowledge and understanding of the internationally growing maritime Industry.
fees: FeesUK - £9,760 (full-time) and £4,880 (part-time), individual courses are £1,220 Overseas - £26,976 (full-time) and £13,488 (part-time), individual courses are £3,372  Overseas includes applications from European Union countries who do not hold Pre-Settled or Settled status in the UK.
